mapper.sql: SELECT t.`id` AS id, t.`created_time` AS createdTime, t.`updated_time` AS updatedTime, t.`enable_flag` AS enableFlag, t.`website_id` AS websiteId, t.`task_id` AS taskId, t.`task_name` AS taskName, t.`description` AS `description`, t.`target` AS target, t.`regex` AS `regex`, t.`mode` AS `mode`, t.`target_area` AS targetArea, t.`min_pagenum` AS minPagenum, t.`max_pagenum` AS maxPagenum, t.`page_size` AS pageSize, t.`run_status` AS runStatus, t.`specials` AS specials FROM t_task_config t
mapper.update: UPDATE t_task_config SET `website_id` = #{websiteId}, `task_name` = #{taskName}, description = #{description}, target = #{target}, `regex` = #{regex}, `mode` = #{mode}, target_area = #{targetArea}, min_pagenum = #{minPagenum}, max_pagenum = #{maxPagenum}, page_size = #{pageSize}, specials = #{specials}, updated_time = NOW() WHERE task_id = #{taskId}
